title: (x) Foti Cleaning Services fancy script - Polonaise
content:
I've checked a few sites, but cannot find this script font? Any ideas?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130612013529im_/http:/typophile.com/files/foti_4649.jpg)
author: vector

comments.content: Hmm, I believe that is a knockoff of Phil Martin's [Polonaise](http://web.archive.org/web/20130612013529/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=UR.123750.0.0&attributes.sampleSize=96&sampleText=Foti+&sampleSize=96).
